entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
